mdRecord.dcterms:title: Ancient Roman tweezers (replica)
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Replica of a ancient Roman tweezers from the first century A.D. Donated to the University of Virginia by members of the 8th Evacuation Hospital Unit of the United States Army.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medicine, Greek and Roman
Medical instruments and apparatus
